entry.title: burned too many miles tryna ride out all the sadness
entry.summary:
Author: farfromthstars

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,413Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: “Speak of the devil!” he grins. “Chris, come here, I was just telling Buck about today.”Buck looks the same, when Christopher can finally see him on the small screen, except his hair is kind of curly now. He’s sitting in their old kitchen, and Christopher is as happy to see him as he’s suddenly homesick.“Christopher!” he shouts, big smile on his face, and then he kind of grimaces a little and starts tearing up. He wipes his eyes and laughs shakily. “Sorry, I– I just really missed you, kid.”“I missed you too, Buck,” Chris admits, and he’s only crying because Buck is, it’s whatever.Dad puts an arm around him, and in their little frame on the FaceTime call, Chris can see that his eyes are suspiciously shiny, too.~christopher and eddie (and buck) after they get "home"

entry.title: I want to be me (is that not allowed?)
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,175Chapters: 2/11Kudos: 130

Summary: “Buck?” Eddie called, worried. He was already half out of his chair when Buck came back to the kitchen.Panic all over his face, mouth ajar and breathing fast, he looked between Chris and Eddie. “What’s going on?”“So… just so that we’re on the same page,” Buck whispered, trying to remain collected, but looking at Chris, “you didn’t call your grandparents, right?”“What? No!” Chris replied at the same volume, looking between Buck and Eddie with horror.“What-““Because they’re currently at our front door,” Buck finally said, still a whisper. Eddie tensed so hard a cold sweat broke along his back.

entry.title: Like You Were My Closest Friend
entry.summary:
Author: isthatacatsherlock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,021Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 217

Summary: Helena did not know that Buck took care of him after he got shot. She certainly didn’t know that he stayed with Chris until he came home from the hospital. She didn’t know what a natural move it was for Buck to take over his lease because he already fit so nicely into his life. She wouldn’t always say anything, but when she did they were just little comments she could tell had some deeper resentment under them.“Sounds like he helped with Chris a lot,” she said one morning over coffee.“It wasn’t like a big deal or anything,” said Chris. Helena was looking at Eddie when she responded “mhm.”It would be impossible to get her to understand, but he needed him here. In theory the choice to move had been easy. Not a choice at all – Chris, above all else. That was true. Buck didn’t just matter, though. He was entwined.

entry.title: let's waltz this out
entry.summary:
Author: atthebarricade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,687Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 182

Summary: “Well, why didn’t you dance with me at Hen and Karen’s vow renewal, then?” he demands. “That was a slow-dancing occasion. I was single.”Eddie considers this and shrugs. “I don’t know. I guess I didn’t know you were so eager to dance with me, Buckley.”Buck wipes his hands on his cargo pants. They’re suddenly very sweaty.“Next time,” Eddie offers.“Well, when’s next time?” Buck does not whine. He doesn’t. Buck eats his leftovers while FaceTiming the Diaz boys. He learns about a certain former pastime of Eddie's.

entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,071Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 75

Summary: “Does this change a thing between us?” Buck asks, his voice low, his hands still framing Eddie’s face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie’s lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck’s mouth like it’s the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie’s fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. “I don’t know.” It’s not a yes—Buck’s not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it’s so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. “Alright,” Buck exhales, nodding like it’s nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie’s mouth in his again. The soft, desperate sound Eddie lets out—like relief and need tangled together—hits Buck like a punch to the chest. or; Eddie’s shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior… or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.title: how lucky are we to have so much to lose?
entry.summary:
Author: rebecca_welton

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,819Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 326

Summary: It happens in a blink of an eye.One moment, his GPS is telling him to change lanes so that he can take the next exit in a quarter of a mile, only twenty minutes away from Eddie’s.The next, the trailer of the eighteen wheeler beside him is suddenly swinging into his lane. He’s never seen a truck jackknife in person. Before he can fully process what’s happening, he hears the scrape of metal against metal as his truck is slammed into the median, and the cab of the eighteen wheeler collides with the front of his car as it folds inwards.

entry.title: to love someone who lets you break them twice
entry.summary:
Author: tinygiantsam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,363Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 549

Summary: “You signed off on your rights to get jealous five years ago.”Eddie stared, his eyes shifting in real time. He brought a hand up to touch his own lips and chin, tugging at the corners like he couldn’t stay still. “You wanna repeat that?”Buck held the stare, biting his lips in thought. He couldn’t help but to glance down at Eddie’s. “Yeah,” he said after a while, his voice deeper. “You lost me, Eddie. And it was a choice you made.”Something similar to a chuckle came out of Eddie’s throat, but they hadn’t been apart long enough for Buck to think he had found something funny. No, Eddie was angry. “There isn’t an inch of you that doesn’t belong to me.”OR: divorced buddie meets again after five years - or so. (includes rage sex, and an eddie with hidden intentions).
